alert.note: Alert for Southeast Elbert County Below 6000 Feet, South Lincoln County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 19 at 2:26PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Lincoln County through 300 PM MDT... At 226 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 5 miles north of Karval, or 32 miles south of Limon, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Karval. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Southeast Elbert County Below 6000 Feet, South Lincoln County
